Dayda

City of New York

This is a catalog of datasets organized and made more accessible from the City of New York, providing simple dowloadable CSV and JSON files, as well as Postman Collections you can use as part of workflows and other automation.

About

    NYC agency spending and budget information by units of appropriation from the Mayor’s Management Report (MMR). For information related to the ‘Applicable MMR Goals’ column, refer to FY19 MMR Goals...

    FY19 MMR Performance Indicators

    NYC agency performance indicators from the FY19 Mayor’s Management Report (MMR).

    FY19 MMR Performance Indicators

    NYC agency performance indicators from the FY19 Mayor’s Management Report (MMR).

    FY19 MMR Goals and Services

    Goals and services for agencies as defined by the Mayor’s Management Report (MMR)

    FY19 MMR Agency Resources

    NYC agency resources from the FY19 Mayor’s Management Report (MMR), including expenditures (includes all funds), personnel, revenue and paid overtime.

    FY19 BID Trends Report Data

    Business improvement district (BID) program/service output and expense data from FY19.

    Funded Capacity Seats and Additional Needs

    Funded capacity seats and additional needs by district for elementary, middle school, by borough for high school.

    Forever Wild Preserves and Natural Areas

    The Forever Wild dataset identifies areas in NYC Parks with the most significant natural habitat. Many of these areas have management practices in place to help preserve this habitat.

    Forever Wild Preserves and Natural Areas

    The Forever Wild dataset identifies areas in NYC Parks with the most significant natural habitat. Many of these areas have management practices in place to help preserve this habitat.
